text:
• Net Interest Margin (NIM) tumbuh menjadi 4,3% seiring dengan meningkatnya kredit dan membaiknya imbal hasil dari komposisi aset
• Total kredit tumbuh 12,4% menjadi Rp36,2 triliun didukung: kontribusi signifikan bisnis corporate banking Rp 32,7 triliun atau 90% dan consumer banking 10% atau Rp3,5 triliun
• Total Dana Pihak Ketiga Rp25,5 triliun dari Rp25,3 triliun
• Pertumbuhan perbankan digital:
- Kinerja LINE Bank by Hana Bank (LINE Bank) telah menjangkau 1 juta Nasabah dengan total simpanan sebesar Rp1,63 triliun dan total kredit sebesar Rp1,47 triliun.
• Permodalan tetap kuat dengan Capital Adequacy Ratio (CAR) sebesar 27,05%
Jakarta, 1 Agustus 2024 – PT Bank KEB Hana Indonesia (Hana Bank) hari ini mengumumkan laporan keuangan semester pertama yang berakhir 30 Juni 2024 ("1H24"), dengan perolehan laba bersih (unaudited) sebesar Rp259,52 miliar, naik sebesar 13,93% year-on-year (“Y-o-Y”).
trans:
• Net Interest Margin (NIM) grows to 4.3% along with the increase of credit and the improvement of yield from the asset composition
• Total credit grows 12.4% to IDR36.2 trillion supported by: significant contributions from corporate banking businesses of IDR 32.7 trillion or 90% and consumer banking of 10% or IDR3.5 trillion.
• Total third-party funds of IDR25.5 trillion from IDR25.3 trillion
• The growth of digital banking:
- The performance of LINE Bank by Hana Bank (LINE Bank) has reached 1 million customers with a total savings of IDR 1.63 trillion and total credit of IDR 1.47 trillion.
• Capital remains strong with a Capital Adequacy Ratio (CAR) of 27.05%
Jakarta, August 1st, 2024 - PT BANK KEB Hana Indonesia (Hana Bank) today published the financial report for the first semester that ended on June 30th, 2024 (1H24") with net profit earning (unaudited) of IDR259.52 million, increased by 13.93% year-on-year ("Y-o-Y").
